title: Agentic AI Kanban
subtitle: a kanban for human in the loop AI coding
description: TaskBoardAI is a lightweight, file-based kanban board system designed for AI agents and human-in-the-loop collaboration. It bridges the gap between AI assistants and human project management, allowing both to maintain and manipulate shared project boards with synchronized updates.
bullets: MCP Server integration for AI assistant compatibility
JSON-based architecture for easy AI parsing
Rich markdown with subtasks and dependencies
Real-time collaboration with webhooks

title: Nutrien
subtitle: Safety Portal
description: Nutrien, the world's largest provider of crop inputs and services, needed a solution to streamline safety document management across 1300 branch locations. The Operating Standards feature simplifies how staff download required global documents and upload completed forms while maintaining compliance.
bullets: Designed an intuitive interface connecting global standards with local branch files
Created responsive components that maintain consistent sizing across all devices
Used user testing insights to identify and address critical compliance concerns
Improved document organization to prevent errors in safety audits

slides.alt: Nutrien Safety Portal multi-file uploader showcase

title: Worldplay
subtitle: Analytics Dashboard — Discovery Process
description: Worldplay needed a comprehensive analytics dashboard to help the internal customer support teams understand the live stream events in real-time. The dashboard provides real-time insights into viewer behavior, content performance, and revenue metrics.
bullets: Real-time analytics visualization
Custom report builder
Audience segmentation tools

title: Context-Kit v2
subtitle: AI-Powered Development Toolkit
description: Context-Kit v2 represents a paradigm shift in AI-human collaboration workflows. This comprehensive toolkit demonstrates AGx Design principles through multi-service architecture, intelligent logging, and seamless MCP integration for Claude Code enhancement.
bullets: AGx Design methodology for AI-human workflow optimization
Multi-service TypeScript architecture with workspace coordination
Comprehensive logging ecosystem across browser, Node.js, and terminal
SQLite knowledge graph with FTS5 full-text search capabilities
YAML optimization reducing configuration complexity by 70%

title: TaskBoardAI v2
subtitle: Dual Interface AI Collaboration
description: TaskBoardAI v2 revolutionizes project management through dual-interface design, enabling seamless collaboration between human visual workflows and AI agent task manipulation. A breakthrough in human-AI interface design for project coordination.
bullets: Dual-interface design optimized for both human and AI interaction patterns
Real-time synchronization between Kanban visual interface and JSON API
MCP Server integration enabling AI agents to read and manipulate project boards
File-based architecture ensuring data portability and AI accessibility
Validated through extensive user testing with markdown list frustrated users

props.title: The Frustrated Markdown User
props.subtitle: Primary Research Insights

persona.name: Sarah Chen
persona.quote: I love markdown for documentation, but tracking project progress in text lists feels like swimming upstream.

demographics.tools: GitHub, Notion, Linear, various markdown editors

painPoints.description: Converting markdown task lists to visual boards is manual and time-consuming
Team members prefer visual kanban while she thinks in structured text
AI agents can read markdown but can't interact with visual project boards

goals: Maintain markdown workflow for planning and documentation
Provide team with visual kanban interface for collaboration
Enable AI agents to participate in project management

research.key_finding: Users want format flexibility without workflow disruption

slides.alt: User persona representing frustrated markdown users needing visual collaboration

benefits: AI agents get structured data access

title: AI Progress Steps v2
subtitle: 5-Stage AI Collaboration Journey
description: AI Progress Steps v2 maps the evolutionary journey of AI-human collaboration proficiency through five distinct stages. This framework helps individuals and teams understand their current capabilities and provides clear pathways for advancement in AI-powered workflows.
bullets: Comprehensive 5-stage framework mapping AI collaboration evolution
Skills assessment matrix with clear progression indicators
Emotional journey mapping showing confidence and capability growth
Prompt evolution tracking from basic requests to complex workflows
Creator-level persona representing advanced AI collaboration mastery

phases.title: Skeptic
phases.description: Initial resistance and uncertainty about AI capabilities

phases.title: Experimenter
phases.description: Cautious exploration with simple, low-risk AI interactions

phases.title: Adopter
phases.description: Regular integration of AI into existing workflows

phases.title: Creator
phases.description: Building AI-enhanced products and novel collaboration patterns

slides.alt: Five-stage AI collaboration journey from skeptic to creator

props.title: Emotional Journey Mapping
props.subtitle: Confidence and Capability Growth Through AI Collaboration Stages
insights: Confidence grows exponentially after initial adoption phase
Capability development requires sustained practice and experimentation
Emotional journey includes skepticism, curiosity, confidence, mastery, and innovation
Peer influence and successful experiences are key transition drivers

slides.alt: Emotional journey mapping showing confidence and capability growth across AI collaboration stages

props.title: Skills Development Matrix
props.subtitle: Capabilities and Competencies at Each Stage

skills.description: Skeptical of outputs, high verification needs
Simple, direct requests with basic context
Good grasp of strengths and limitations
Deep knowledge of model capabilities and limitations

progressionInsights: Skills develop non-linearly with experience and practice
Quality assessment improves significantly with sustained use
Workflow integration requires both technical and process skills
Advanced prompt engineering emerges in optimizer stage

slides.alt: Skills matrix showing capability progression across five AI collaboration stages

props.title: Prompt Evolution Across Stages
props.subtitle: How Communication with AI Agents Develops Over Time

conversationStages.prompt: Can you help me write an email?
conversationStages.aiResponse: I'd be happy to help! Could you provide more details about the email's purpose, recipient, and key points?
conversationStages.learningPoint: AI needs context to be effective

conversationStages.prompt: Write a professional email to my boss requesting a meeting to discuss my performance review.
conversationStages.aiResponse:
Subject: Request for Performance Review Meeting

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss my upcoming performance review...
conversationStages.outcome: Useful output with minor edits needed

conversationStages.prompt: Write a professional email to Sarah Chen, my manager, requesting a 30-minute meeting next week to discuss my Q4 performance review. I want to focus on my project achievements, areas for improvement, and career development goals. Tone should be confident but collaborative.
conversationStages.aiResponse: [Detailed, well-crafted email with appropriate tone, structure, and content addressing all specified points]
conversationStages.learningPoint: Context and specificity dramatically improve quality

conversationStages.prompt: Act as a communications expert helping me craft an email to my manager Sarah Chen. Context: I'm requesting a performance review meeting for Q4. I completed 3 major projects ahead of schedule, led a successful team initiative, but struggled with stakeholder communication. Tone: Professional, confident, growth-oriented. Structure: Clear subject line, brief context, specific meeting request, preview of discussion topics. Include subtle language that positions me as proactive and development-focused.
conversationStages.context: Sophisticated prompt with role, context, constraints
conversationStages.aiResponse: [Expertly crafted email demonstrating advanced understanding of professional communication, psychology, and positioning]
conversationStages.learningPoint: Advanced prompting techniques unlock AI's full potential

conversationStages.prompt: You're a senior executive communications strategist. I need to craft a sequence of communications for my upcoming performance review cycle. Primary: Email requesting meeting with manager Sarah. Secondary: Follow-up agenda. Tertiary: Post-meeting summary template. Context: High-performing individual contributor, 3 major projects delivered, team leadership growth, stakeholder communication as development area. Strategy: Position for promotion consideration while showing self-awareness and growth mindset. Audience: Tech startup culture, data-driven, values transparency. Constraints: Each piece should reinforce the others, maintain consistent personal brand, incorporate feedback loops. Generate the sequence with rationale for each strategic choice.
conversationStages.aiResponse: [Comprehensive communication strategy with multiple interconnected pieces, strategic rationale, and advanced understanding of organizational dynamics]
conversationStages.outcome: Strategic solution addressing complex business needs
conversationStages.learningPoint: AI becomes a strategic thinking partner

evolutionPatterns: Prompts evolve from vague to highly specific
Role definition and constraints emerge in advanced stages
Multi-turn and complex request handling develops
Strategic thinking integration appears at creator level

slides.alt: Agent conversation flow showing prompt evolution from basic to sophisticated across five stages

props.title: The Creator Level Persona
props.subtitle: Advanced AI Collaboration Mastery

persona.name: Marcus Rivera
persona.role: Senior Product Designer & AI Innovation Lead
persona.quote: AI isn't just a tool in my workflow—it's my creative thinking partner. We build experiences together that neither of us could imagine alone.

demographics.experience: 8+ years in design, 3+ years in AI collaboration
demographics.tools: Claude Code, GPT-4, Midjourney, custom AI workflows, MCP integrations

capabilities.description: Builds AI-enhanced product experiences and novel interaction patterns
Creates sophisticated multi-turn conversations and complex reasoning chains
Mentors others and drives organizational AI transformation

workflow.daily: Begins each project with AI-assisted research, uses collaborative prompting for ideation, integrates AI feedback throughout design iterations
workflow.weekly: Refines AI workflows based on project learnings, shares innovations with team, explores new AI capabilities
workflow.monthly: Publishes insights on AI-design collaboration, mentors junior designers, advises clients on AI integration

achievements: Reduced design iteration time by 60% through AI collaboration
Built agency's first AI-enhanced design system
Recognized as 'AI Innovation Leader' at Design+AI Conference 2024
Created reusable AI workflow templates adopted across industry

mindset.core_belief: AI amplifies human creativity rather than replacing it
mindset.approach: Collaborative partnership with AI as thinking partner
mindset.future_vision: AI-human design teams creating previously impossible experiences

slides.alt: Creator-level persona representing advanced AI collaboration mastery
